mapper.select: select * from feebilldetails where (febide_type='检查' or febide_type='化验') and febide_feebill_no=#{id}
select ks_name from assay_meal where assay_meal_id = #{param}
select * from patient p inner join seedoctor s on p.patient_no = s.seedo_patient_no where 1 = 1 and s.seedo_number = #{param}
mapper.update: update prescription set pres_state = #{zt} where pres_seedo_number = #{param}
update assay set assay_state = #{zt} where assay_seedo_number = #{param}
update examineorder set exaord_state = #{zt} where exaord_seedo_number = #{param}
update mzshoushucf set ss_zt = #{zt} where ss_seedo_number = #{param}
update mzshoushuxq as alias_1 inner join (select ss_no from mzshoushucf where ss_seedo_number = #{param}) as alias_2 set alias_1.sq_state = 2 where alias_1.sq_ss_no = alias_2.ss_no
update labworkdetails as alias_1 inner join (select assay_no from assay where assay_seedo_number = #{param}) as alias_2 set alias_1.labdet_state = 2 where alias_1.labdet_assay_no = alias_2.assay_no

update examinedetails as alias_1 inner join (select exaord_no from examineorder where exaord_seedo_number = #{param}) as alias_2 set alias_1.exadet_state = 2 where alias_1.exadet_exaord_no = alias_2.exaord_no
update prescriptiondetails as alias_1 inner join (select pres_no from prescription where pres_seedo_number = #{param}) as alias_2 set alias_1.state = 2 where alias_1.predet_pres_no = alias_2.pres_no
mapper.select: select p.drug_id as id,p.drug_name as name,p.number as count,p.xiaoji as xiaoji from prescriptiondetails p inner join prescription pr on p.predet_pres_no = pr.pres_no where 1 = 1 and p.state = 1 and pr.pres_seedo_number = #{param}

select l.assay_meal_id as id,am.assay_meal_name as name,l.labdet_count as count,l.assay_meal_price as xiaoji from labworkdetails l inner join assay a on a.assay_no = l.labdet_assay_no inner join assay_meal am on am.assay_meal_id = l.assay_meal_id where 1 = 1 and l.labdet_state = 1 and a.assay_seedo_number = #{param}

select ed.assay_meal_id as id,am.assay_meal_name as name,ed.exadet_count as count,ed.assay_meal_price as xiaoji from examinedetails ed inner join examineorder e on e.exaord_no = ed.exadet_exaord_no inner join assay_meal am on am.assay_meal_id = ed.assay_meal_id where 1 = 1 and ed.exadet_state = 1 and exaord_seedo_number = #{param}

select x.sur_no as id,s.sur_name as name,x.sq_count as count,x.sur_pay as xiaoji from mzshoushuxq x inner join mzshoushucf c on c.ss_no = x.sq_ss_no inner join sur_item s on x.sur_no = s.sur_no where 1 = 1 and x.sq_state = 1 and c.ss_seedo_number = #{param}

select t2.* from ( select s.seedo_number as no,pa.patient_name as name,pa.patient_idcart as card,pa.patient_phone as phone,s.seedo_famiroom_name as ks,s.seedo_doctor_name as ys, sum(IFNULL(p.pres_money,0)+IFNULL(a.assay_money,0)+IFNULL(e.exaord_money,0)+IFNULL(m.ss_money,0)) as zjg from seedoctor s left join prescription p on (s.seedo_number = p.pres_seedo_number) and p.pres_state = 1 left join assay a on (s.seedo_number = a.assay_seedo_number) and a.assay_state = 1 left join examineorder e on (s.seedo_number = e.exaord_seedo_number) and e.exaord_state = 1 left join mzshoushucf m on (s.seedo_number = m.ss_seedo_number) and m.ss_zt = 1 inner join patient pa on pa.patient_no = s.seedo_patient_no where 1 = 1
and pa.patient_name like '%${name}%'
and pa.patient_idcart like '%${idcard}%'
and pa.patient_phone like '%${phone}%'
and s.seedo_number like '%${mzhao}%'
and to_days(s.seedo_date) = to_days(now()) group by s.seedo_number desc ) t2 where zjg != 0
